intercept(Object, Method, Object[], MethodProxy) - Method in class org.latency4j.spring.Latency4JDynamicProxy
Method interceptor, which in the case of Latency4J annotated methods will: Create a latency monitor for either the category specified in the annotation, or an implicit category built from the name of the intercepted method. Invoke LatencyMonitor.taskStarted() on the monitor instance. Call the proxied method. Invoke either LatencyMonitor.taskCompleted() or LatencyMonitor.taskErrored(Throwable) on the monitor instance post completion of the proxied method.
